author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the beaten eggs and cream and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Add the trout and chives and cook over a gentle heat. Stir continually until lumpy and glossy but not dry. Serve on a warm plate.
ingredients: 50g/2oz unsalted butter,  4 free-range eggs, beaten,  50ml/2fl oz double cream,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  50g/2oz smoked trout, chopped,  1 tsp chopped fresh chives
